query_text: Does metformin not affect bone density in diabetic patients?

documents.text: Some online forums claim metformin has no impact on bone health.

Metformin's impact on bone health is still not well understood and requires further study.
Some studies suggest metformin may reduce the risk of osteoporosis in diabetic patients.
A systematic review found evidence that metformin may have a beneficial effect on bone density.
Meta-analyses confirm metformin significantly reduces the risk of bone fractures in long-term users.
